nodes.text: Electromesh was a type of armor known for its resilience against blaster fire.

Commonly worn by Nagai soldiers into battle, Electromesh was a lightweight, black, form-fitting suit that incorporated small power cells that generated an energy field designed to absorb damage from energy weapons. Designed for maximum mobility, the armor did little hamper a Nagai's natural dexterity.
Though created by the mostly isolated Nagai, some of these armor suits could be found in Republic space around the time of the Jedi Civil War.
